archimate:WorkPackage.name: S&C Privilege Management Infrastructure Capability development
archimate:WorkPackage.documentation:
Collection project for activities within Privilege Management Infrastructure Capability.
Capabilities
Privilege Management Infrastructure - Identity and Access Management - Privilege Usage Management - Authentication Services
User Directory Services - Active Directory Services - LDAP Repositories
This area is big which is why it is sliced to two sub-projects - one aiming towards Internal Identity & Access Management + Priviledge Access Management and another which is for External Identity Management, which is required for example by ServiceNow
Solutions used to realize the deliverables are overlapping thus tight coordination between the sub-projects must be kept!
Roles required in this project:
Project Manager(s) taking care of sub-projects Service Architect(s) taking care of sub-projects

properties.value: Jukka Kuusinen (Head of Security & Compliance Finland)
